original_text: When the man of God had finished eating and drinking, the prophet who had brought him back saddled his donkey for him.
korean_text: 그리고 자기가 데리고 온 선지자가 떡을 먹고 물을 마신 후에 그를 위하여 나귀에 안장을 지우니라

sentences.original_text: When the man of God had finished eating and drinking
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님의 사람이 먹고 마시기를 마쳤을 때

sentences.original_text: the prophet who had brought him back

sentences.korean_translation: 그를 위해 그의 나귀에 안장을 씌웠다
